page.title: 01 Introduction : Gazetteer
page.content: This block is on the eastern outskirts of the city of Hull.It can be called the{rural-urban}fringe.The two villages,Sutton and Bilton,have been engulfed by the spread of Hull's suburbs.These villages contain some local shops and quite expensive private housing for commuters or the retired.The city suburbs are mainly 1950's council estates. Half the area is farmland and there is no manufacturing.Main features include:- The villages of{Sutton & Bilton } (p4+11), 3 city{council estates} (p17+18) the old Hull to Hornsea {Railway}line (p5+6), the{A165}trunk road to the coast(p8), the{Ganstead {Riding School}(p9), the Princess Royal {Hospital}(p10), several{schools}and playing fields (p7,19+20), the Holderness{Drain}(p2). ( {NB p=page})
